items.sentence: Tom looked exactly like his profile picture.
Is there something you want to tell me, Tom?
It cost me a fortune to get my car repaired.
Nobody goes outside in this kind of weather.
I\'ll visit you sometime in the near future.
I\'m afraid I took your umbrella by mistake.
Mary claimed that her purse had been stolen.
I emailed Tom the pictures I took yesterday.
Tom is collecting blankets for the homeless.
Tom is drawing on the wall with white chalk.
Tom is eating dinner now in the dining room.
Tom knew that it was about to start raining.
Tom knew that something was wrong with Mary.
Tom persuaded Mary to go to Boston with him.
Tom plans to hire someone who speaks French.
Tom planted some flower seeds in his garden.
I asked Tom how much he expected to be paid.
Tom is responsible for preparing the report.
Tom is still in love with his ex-girlfriend.
Do you know what time Tom left this morning?
